option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <inset xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:insetLeft="8dp" android:insetRight="8dp" android:insetTop="8dp" android:insetBottom="8dp"> <shape android:shape="oval"> <solid android:color="#A0A0A0"/> </shape> </inset>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <inset xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:insetLeft="8dp" android:insetRight="8dp" android:insetTop="8dp" android:insetBottom="8dp"> <shape android:shape="oval"> <solid android:color="#A0A0A0"/> </shape> </inset>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <inset xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:insetLeft="8dp" android:insetRight="8dp" android:insetTop="8dp" android:insetBottom="8dp"> <shape android:shape="oval"> <solid android:color="#2D55FF"/> </shape> </inset>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <inset xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:insetLeft="8dp" android:insetRight="8dp" android:insetTop="8dp" android:insetBottom="8dp"> <shape android:shape="oval"> <solid android:color="#2D55FF"/> </shape> </inset>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <inset xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:insetLeft="8dp" android:insetRight="8dp" android:insetTop="8dp" android:insetBottom="8dp"> <shape android:shape="oval"> <solid android:color="#FF0000"/> </shape> </inset>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <inset xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:insetLeft="8dp" android:insetRight="8dp" android:insetTop="8dp" android:insetBottom="8dp"> <shape android:shape="oval"> <solid android:color="#FF0000"/> </shape> </inset>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/bg_trangchu">
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scrollbars="none">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/khung_tieu_de" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:padding="12dp" android:orientation="vertical">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<View android:id="@+id/nen_icon_sach" android:layout_width="50dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_xanhduong" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img_icon_sach" android:layout_width="34dp" android:layout_height="31dp" android:layout_gravity="center" app:srcCompat="@drawable/img_ic_book" app:tint="@color/white" /> </FrameLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_ten_ung_dung" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="English App" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<RelativeLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="50dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_nhapdulieu"> <EditText android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@null" android:hint="Tìm kiếm..." android:paddingStart="20dp" android:textSize="14sp" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_timkiem" android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" android:layout_centerVertical="true" android:layout_marginEnd="15dp" app:tint="@color/royalBlue"/> </RelativeLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Mức độ hoạt động" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"/>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<RelativeLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<FrameLayout android:id="@+id/khung_chua_tien_do" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<com.google.android.material.progressindicator.CircularProgressIndicator android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:progress="72" app:indicatorColor="@color/royalBlue" app:indicatorSize="80dp" app:trackColor="#E6EBF5" app:trackCornerRadius="4dp" app:trackThickness="8dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:text="72%" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </FrameLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="210dp" android:layout_height="90dp" android:layout_alignBottom="@+id/khung_chua_tien_do" android:layout_marginStart="23dp" android:layout_marginBottom="-1dp" android:layout_toEndOf="@id/khung_chua_tien_do" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Thành viên trong gia đình" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Gia đình" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Hãy cố gắng và tiếp tục nào!" /> </LinearLayout>
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatButton android:id="@+id/btn_tiep_tuc_hoc" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="45dp" android:layout_below="@id/khung_chua_tien_do" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:background="@drawable/shape_button_active_course" android:text="Tiếp tục học" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textStyle="bold" /> </RelativeLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Bài tập" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rcv_kiem_tra_nhanh" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="10dp" android:overScrollMode="never" />
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Chuỗi ngày hoạt động" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp" android:layout_marginTop="20dp"/>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="10dp">
<com.prolificinteractive.materialcalendarview.MaterialCalendarView android:id="@+id/calendarView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:mcv_showOtherDates="all" app:mcv_selectionColor="@color/royalBlue" app:mcv_headerTextAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Medium" app:mcv_weekDayTextAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Small" app:mcv_dateTextAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Small" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </RelativeLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/bg_trangchu">
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scrollbars="none">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/khung_tieu_de" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:padding="12dp" android:orientation="vertical">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<View android:id="@+id/nen_icon_sach" android:layout_width="50dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_xanhduong" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img_icon_sach" android:layout_width="34dp" android:layout_height="31dp" android:layout_gravity="center" app:srcCompat="@drawable/img_ic_book" app:tint="@color/white" /> </FrameLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_ten_ung_dung" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="English App" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<RelativeLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="50dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_nhapdulieu"> <EditText android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@null" android:hint="Tìm kiếm..." android:paddingStart="20dp" android:textSize="14sp" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_timkiem" android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" android:layout_centerVertical="true" android:layout_marginEnd="15dp" app:tint="@color/royalBlue"/> </RelativeLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Mức độ hoạt động" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"/>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<RelativeLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<FrameLayout android:id="@+id/khung_chua_tien_do" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<com.google.android.material.progressindicator.CircularProgressIndicator android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:progress="72" app:indicatorColor="@color/royalBlue" app:indicatorSize="80dp" app:trackColor="#E6EBF5" app:trackCornerRadius="4dp" app:trackThickness="8dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:text="72%" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </FrameLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="210dp" android:layout_height="90dp" android:layout_alignBottom="@+id/khung_chua_tien_do" android:layout_marginStart="23dp" android:layout_marginBottom="-1dp" android:layout_toEndOf="@id/khung_chua_tien_do" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Thành viên trong gia đình" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Gia đình" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Hãy cố gắng và tiếp tục nào!" /> </LinearLayout>
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatButton android:id="@+id/btn_tiep_tuc_hoc" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="45dp" android:layout_below="@id/khung_chua_tien_do" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:background="@drawable/shape_button_active_course" android:text="Tiếp tục học" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textStyle="bold" /> </RelativeLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Bài tập" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rcv_kiem_tra_nhanh" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="10dp" android:overScrollMode="never" />
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Chuỗi ngày hoạt động" android:textColor="@color/royalBlue" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp" android:layout_marginTop="20dp"/>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<com.prolificinteractive.materialcalendarview.MaterialCalendarView android:id="@+id/calendarView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:mcv_showOtherDates="all" app:mcv_selectionColor="@color/royalBlue" app:mcv_headerTextAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Medium" app:mcv_weekDayTextAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Medium" app:mcv_dateTextAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Medium" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </RelativeLayout>
